subject: Reminder about Refund Request for Order #SSN4382
description_text:
Dear SIMSONN team,

I am writing to follow up on my previous request regarding the cancellation
and refund of my order #SSN4382.

 It has now been several business days since you confirmed that the refund
would be processed, but I have not yet received it.

Could you please provide an update on the status of the refund and let me
know when I can expect the payment to be completed?

Best regards

conversations.body_text: We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Your refund has been processed. Please check your account.
